title: A new threat to Rittenhouse Square Park
title_page: A new threat to Rittenhouse Square Park
maintext:
By Justine McDaniel, STAFF WRITER
After a week of attention to the walls of Rittenhouse Square - on which sitting was briefly and controversially banned by city officials - the park faced a threat Saturday night not from tired behinds but something else: a car.
A white sedan crashed into the popular park in one of Center Cityâ€™s toniest neighborhoods around 10 p.m., appearing to mangle a wrought-iron fence and hedge at the 18th Street entrance.
Continue reading on Philly.com
